title: 4th COVID-19 dose from Monday (9)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Health announced that steps have been taken to administer the fourth dose of the COVID-19 vaccine to Sri Lankans from Monday (9).
Deputy Director-General of Public Health Services, of the Ministry of Health, Dr. Hemantha Herath said that the 4th dose will be given to all those who obtained the 3rd dose over three months ago.
